fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Peasants
Defense: Basic Auto-vest against Evils

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Upon winning, you must choose a player whose vote is in your backpack to kill.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, choose to either appear Innocent or Suspicious.
- At the end of each day, all votes currently against you are added to your backpack. You win once you have 6 votes in your backpack.
- Upon winning, you leave the town in victory at the end of the day and it's announced.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Accumulate 6 votes against you over any number of days, but not be hanged.
